name: Fowl Play (evolbug)
description:
This game is a neverending online battle for delicious eggs, that will make you want an omelette.

Created by Niels "Nilq" and Daniels "evolbug", as part of MiniJam 50 for the theme Islands. We planned to have more islands, but we found that island property costs more than our allowance. We will likely update this with more fun stuff.

The game is multiplayer so you might want to find a buddy to play with if there's noone on. Server is based in EU, and we aren't professional network engineers so don't mind a bit (a lot) of lag occasionally ;P

Source available here: https://github.com/antloop-studios/fowl-play

Controls

Esc - exit the game
W,A,S,D - movement
Mouse - aim your attack
Mouse Left Click - punch with all your might

Gameplay

Find the opposing chicken and steal its eggs to make a delicious omelette. Protect your own chick by blasting your enemies into space with your mighty fists.
